Package database

Enum ColumnType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ColumnType>
      • database.ColumnType

  • public enum ColumnType
extends java.lang.Enum<ColumnType>
    This class intends to represent the different types of columns that are used by the monitoring database.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      ACTUALLY_SHIFTED_NODESTEP_FRACTION
      Fraction of node steps that were actually shifted during a DR event response.
      AVERAGE_NODES_PER_JOB
      Average amount of nodes per job of the jobs that ran at the beginning of a DR event.
      AVERAGE_REMAINING_RUNTIME
      Average remaining runtime of jobs that ran at the beginning of a DR event.
      ENERGY_COST
      Energy cost.
      HVAC_EC
      HVAC power consumption.
      IT_POWER
      IT power consumption.
      JOB_POWER
      Server/job power consumption.
      MAXIMUM_POWER_PROVISION
      Maximum power provision (DR event request response).
      NUMBER_OF_ACTIVE_NODES
      Number of active nodes.
      NUMBER_OF_RUNNING_JOBS
      Number of running jobs.
      OPTIMAL_SCALING_FREQUENCY
      Optimal scaling frequency (power demand flexibility configuration).
      OPTIMAL_SHIFTING_FRACTION
      Optimal shifting fraction (power demand flexibility configuration).
      SLA_COST
      SLA cost.
      TIMESTAMP
      Timestamp.
      TOTAL_EC
      Total facility power consumption.

        public static ColumnType valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:

      • convertToStringName

        public static java.lang.String convertToStringName​(ColumnType type)
        This method converts a value of ColumnType to the text name that should be used within the database.
        Parameters:
        type - Value of ColumnType for which the text name is requested.
        Returns:
        Text string name of the ColumnType value that was passed as parameter.

      • getDatabaseVarType

        public static java.lang.String getDatabaseVarType​(ColumnType type)
        Converts a value of ColumnType to the string representation of the datatype that the corresponding database column has in SQL. All returned strings are valid text representations of datatypes that are available in the SQLite database system.
        Parameters:
        type - Value of ColumnType for which the SQL datatype is requested.
        Returns:
        SQL datatype of the ColumnType that is indicated by the passed parameter as text representation.

      • getJavaVarType

        public static VarType getJavaVarType​(ColumnType type)
        Converts a value of ColumnType to a value of VarType, which represents the java datatype of the corresponding database column.
        Parameters:
        type - A value of ColumnType that represents the database column for which the java datatype is requested.
        Returns:
        A value of VarType that represents the java datatype of the database column that corresponds to the value of ColumnType that was passed as parameter.
